DOMQuadP3.summary: The DOMQuad interface's p3 property holds the object that represents one of the four corners of the DOMQuad. When created from , it is the point (x + width, y + height).
DOMQuadP3.value: The object includes the following double-precision floating-point values:Each of these values is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be or ).
